methods.name: public Builder setDeviceIdleRequired()
methods.comment: * This constraint requires the device is idle.

methods.name: public Builder setAppNotForegroundRequired()
methods.comment: * This constraint requires the app in question is not in the foreground.

methods.name: public Builder setAppNotInteractingRequired()
methods.comment:
* This constraint requires the app in question is not interacting with the user. * User interaction includes: *
    *
  • playing or recording audio/video
    • *
  • sending or receiving network data
    • *
  • being visible to the user
    • *

methods.name: public Builder setAppNotTopVisibleRequired()
methods.comment:
* This constraint requires the app in question is not top-visible to the user.
             * A top-visible app is showing UI at the top of the screen that the user is
             * interacting with.
             *
             * Note this constraint is a subset of {@link #setAppNotForegroundRequired()}
             * because a top-visible app is also a foreground app. This is also a subset
             * of {@link #setAppNotInteractingRequired()} because a top-visible app is interacting
             * with the user.
             *
             * @see ActivityManager.RunningAppProcessInfo#IMPORTANCE_FOREGROUND

methods.name: public Builder setNotInCallRequired()
methods.comment: * This constraint requires there is no ongoing call in the device.
